items.reviewContent:
Received in excellent packing. A brand new iron with very good performance. 
Few tiny observations
1. warranty card without date and stamp
2. Manual doesn't specify the names of various parts (See picture)
3. Provided beaker is still has water while the max sign on iron is reached. So fill iron consciously or mark a point on beaker 1cm below the max.
4. During steam ironing, once iron is placed on its heel, strong steam gushes out.
